intended_use_inference.statement: BN-Syn is intended to be a deterministic Bio-AI research/validation platform with a primary CLI workflow (sleep-stack/demo) plus reproducible verification gates (tests/lint/typecheck/build).

notes: Coverage estimate based on mandatory docs/CI/manifests + representative source layout inspection, not full-file exhaustive read.

blockers.title: Verification gate fails: proof bundle hash index is internally inconsistent
blockers.symptom: Running the canonical test suite fails in test_audit_suite_artifacts due to SHA mismatch.
blockers.expected: python -m pytest -m "not validation" -q should pass for contributor verification workflow.
blockers.actual: pytest exits 1 at tests/test_audit_suite_artifacts.py::test_proof_bundle_index_hashes_match_files; index records hash 4eb6... but file hash is baa4....
blockers.root_cause_hypothesis: proof_bundle/index.json is stale relative to proof_bundle/command_index.json.
fix_minimal_plan: Regenerate proof bundle index with current SHA256 values.
Add CI/pre-commit check to fail when proof_bundle/index.json is stale.
scope_constraints: Only refresh evidence artifact index and related checks.

blockers.title: Build command unavailable after documented development install
blockers.symptom: python -m build fails with ModuleNotFoundError in a freshly prepared dev environment.
blockers.expected: Build command should run after following documented setup path and AGENTS build instruction.
blockers.actual: After python -m pip install -e ".[dev]", running python -m build exits 1: No module named build.
blockers.root_cause_hypothesis: build dependency is not included in project dependencies or dev extra; CI works only because workflow installs build explicitly.
fix_minimal_plan: Add build to dev dependency set or docs setup command.
Align AGENTS/README/Makefile instructions with CI install line.
evidence: cmd:python -m pip install build && python -m build | log:proof_bundle/logs/04_verification.log | exit:0

improvements.title: Test run mutates repository working tree (tests_inventory.json) which adds friction for contributors

fastest_unblock_sequence: Repair proof_bundle/index.json hash entries and rerun pytest gate.
Make build tool available by default in contributor setup path.
Rerun canonical gates: pytest(not validation), ruff, pylint, mypy, python -m build.
